name: sun-times-daily-generator
description: Automated daily city page generator for sun times website with SEO optimization

scripts.deploy: npm run generate && git add . && git commit -m "Daily sun times update - $(date +%Y-%m-%d)" && git push origin main
scripts.test: node -e "const { CitySelector } = require('./generate-pages.js'); const sel = new CitySelector(); console.log('Test cities:', sel.getDailyCities(3));"

author: Your Name
